xml.title: Atari Mobile Daily Stats Summary
xml.description: NOTE: All revenue data is gross and for iOS only. NOTE: MAU and Engagement metrics are not available for all games.
xml.query: select 'DAU' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_daily_stats where metric='dau' group by 1 union select 'Installs' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_daily_stats where metric='installs' group by 1 union select 'MAU' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_daily_stats where metric='mau' group by 1 union select 'Revenue' as Metric, concat('$',format(sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end),2)) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_daily_stats where metric='revenue' group by 1 union select 'Revenue/DAU' as Metric, concat('$',format(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end),3)) as Value, concat(format(100*(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end))/ (sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end))-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end))/ (sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end))-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_daily_stats where metric in('revenue','dau') group by 1 order by 1 ;

select game_name as 'Game', sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end) as DAU, 100*sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100 as 'DAU DoD % Change', 100*sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100 as 'DAU WoW % Change', sum(case when metric='installs' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end) as Installs, 100*sum(case when metric='installs' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='installs' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100 as 'Installs DoD % Change', 100*sum(case when metric='installs' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='installs' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100 as 'Installs WoW % Change', sum(case when metric='mau' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end) as MAU, 100*sum(case when metric='mau' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='mau' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)-100 as 'MAU DoD % Change', 100*sum(case when metric='mau' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='mau' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100 as 'MAU WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_daily_stats a, lookups.l_flurry_game g where a.metric in ('dau','installs', 'mau') and a.game_id=g.game_id and a.client_id=g.device_id group by 1 having sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date in ('$date$', '$date$', date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day)) then value else 0 end) > 0 order by 2 desc ;
